body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Eugene Lewis from Harmony Music School. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sharon. Could you provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is sharon.morgan@example.com and my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I wanted to ask about the pricing plans for music lessons. Do you offer any discounts for long-term commitments?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Yes, we do offer discounts for long-term commitments. We can discuss the details once I have more information. Is there anything else you would like to know, Sharon?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Can you tell me more about the qualifications of your music instructors?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, our instructors are highly qualified professionals with years of experience in music education. Thank you for your questions, Sharon. I appreciate your time. If you have any more inquiries, feel free to reach out. Have a great day.
